channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Why I Love Watching Curling
item.description: Within the sports culture of more, bigger, and faster, the epically slow winter sport of curling is an entrancing watch.

item.title: Why Are Some Women Training for Pregnancy Like It’s a Marathon?
item.description: A growing legion of “zero trimester” influencers are convincing followers that healthy pregnancies are a choice—and that raw milk, watching sunsets, a...

item.title: Alexa+, Amazon’s AI assistant, is now available to everyone in the U.S.
item.description: Amazon opens Alexa+ to everyone in the U.S. The AI feature is free for Prime members across devices, and free for everyone on mobile and web.

item.title: Outdoor Vitals Vantage Alpine Puffer Jacket Review: Perfect Spring Puffer
item.description: Outdoor Vitals' Vantage Alpine puffer jacket uses gold-embedded down to break up water molecules to keep you warm and dry.

item.title: Alpine Skier Ryan Cochran-Siegle’s Starter Pack: Winter Olympics 2026
item.description: From maple syrup packets to a latex pillow, these are his personal essentials that bring a taste of Vermont to Milan.

item.title: After backlash, Adobe cancels Adobe Animate shutdown and puts app on ‘maintenance mode’
item.description: Adobe Animate will be discontinued on March 1, 2026, as Adobe shifts its focus to AI.

item.title: ElevenLabs raises $500M from Sequioia at a $11 billion valuation
item.description: ElevenLabs' valuation has raised more than three times in the last twelve months.

item.title: SNAK Venture Partners raises $50M fund to back vertical marketplaces
item.description: SNAK Venture Partners announced Wednesday the close of its oversubsubscribed $50 million debut fund, anchored by Pritzker Group.

item.title: The 2026 Winter Olympics Opening and Closing Ceremonies: What You Need to Know
item.description: From Heated Rivalry stars to the event’s iconic venues, here’s what you should be looking out for at the Winter Olympics 2026 opening and closing cere...

item.title: Uber appoints new CFO as its AV plans accelerate
item.description: Uber is promoting Balaji Krishnamurthy, its VP of strategic finance and investor relations, to be its CFO, replacing its current finance chief Prashan...
